name: Journey Bloom
description: Successfully led development of a travel app for tourist, including conducting user research and developing go-to-market strategy. Monitored usage and conducted user testing, leading to improvements and new feature development.
title: Journey Bloom

name: Acexam (Ace your Exam)

title: Acexam (Ace your Exam)

name: Balm App
description: Balm app is a hypothetical wellness app with a well detailed Product Required Document (PRD) was prepared by me.
title: Balm App

name: Kuda Bank Debit Card Designed For Teenagers
description: This portfolio explores the features and benefits of the Kuda Bank debit card designed for teenagers. It highlights the advantages of the card, such as its accessibility, affordability, and security, and provides insights into the financial behaviors and preferences of teenagers in Nigeria. The portfolio also includes a review of the market landscape and competition.
title: Kuda Bank Debit Card Designed For Teenagers
